name: DOUBLE LIFE
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2020, USC Location. 

Jam Theme: "Repair"

A hybrid FPS/Visual Novel, DOUBLE LIFE is a game about being an assassin and call worker at the same time. Fight against hordes of cops while answering IT support questions and dealing with difficult customers.

PLEASE NOTE: There are currently no plans to continue this project, and so the game is simply presented 'as-is', as such there WILL be a lot of missing content and potential bugs.

CREDITS: 

A GAME PROTOTYPE BY - Paiam Moghaddam, Aria How, Ani Devoian, and Alex Tomkow.

WITH MUSIC AND SOUND BY - katton:

https://katton.bandcamp.com/

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - MOVE
  • SHIFT - RUN
  • Q/E - LEAN (epic!)
  • LEFT CLICK - SHOOT
  • R - RELOAD
  • MOUSE WHEEL - SWITCH WEAPONS
  • T - ADVANCE DIALOGUE (VERY IMPORTANT!)
